items.text: short of a length in the channel, opens the face and runs it down to third man
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Karthik, 1 run

items.text: length on leg stump, flicked to deep square's left
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Sharma, 1 run

items.text: sharp from Rubel. Karthik's initial weight transfer is forward and he quickly sends him back with a bouncer that fizzes past his right shoulder
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Karthik, no run

items.text: short and wide outside off, slashes and gets it our to third man
items.postText: Jojo: "Rohit's wicket could be Trophy lifter for Tigers, because Indian middle order is not so familiar with these condition and they don't have much batting practice. I wan't him out even being neutral..."
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Karthik, 1 run

items.text: overpitched outside off and he plays the wrong line as he looks for the cover drive. It trickles past the bowler and to mid-off's right
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Karthik, 1 run

items.text: length outside off, a late drive on the up to get it to sweeper's left
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Sharma, 1 run

items.preText: Asad Cheema: "DK future in team India lie greatly on this inning. Pressure+chasing+more than 150 runs req. Truly a platform for him to impress,"
items.text: moves at the ball this time, in better shape for the drive. Gets the length ball to sweeper's right
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Karthik, 1 run

items.text: length just outside off, punched to sweeper's left
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Sharma, 1 run

items.text: beaten. Offcutter at a length skids straight on and past the outside edge as he hangs the bat out
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Karthik, no run

items.text: another slower ball. Waits for this one and runs it off the face to third man's left
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Karthik, 2 runs

items.text: just clears fine leg. Bouncer again, catching an Indian batsman by surprise. This one's headed for the crest on his helmet and he's late on the hook. But it's safely to the fine leg fielder's right off the top edge
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Sharma, SIX runs

items.text: length on off stump, blocked solidly on the front foot
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Sharma, no run

items.text: offcutter at a length outside off, sliced to point off the front foot
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Sharma, no run

items.text: length on leg stump, tapped to midwicket from the crease
items.postText: Sumeet: "My heart badly wants Karthik to succeed in this situation but my brain tells me that he is going to throw it away just like he did in England. These situations are what separate great domestic players from international ones."
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Sharma, no run

items.text: length ball shaping into the stumps and he stands tall as he punches elegantly back down the pitch. Finds the stumps at the other end and for some reason...the crowd erupts in boos...
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Sharma, no run

items.text: poor judgement all around and at the end of it all, both Indian batsmen survive, the fielder hits the stumps, and gets a earful from Mushfiqur because it's at the wrong end. Terrible calling from Rohit. He punches this past the non-striker and calls for the run. It's his call. Halfway through, he says no. Karthik turns around to run back and...Rohit follows him. Did he forget he said no? Remembers two strides later and is now dashing back to the striker's end as the fielder gets ready to throw. Except, the throw smashes down the stumps at the non-striker's end where Karthik is safely back. Rohit makes it to safety. Surprisingly.
items.postText: Vivek: "DK continues to plonk his bat every time and jumped once in the crease. Don't the analyst pass the message during drinks. Very lethargic from a senior player. "
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Sharma, no run

items.text: full on off stump, driven firmly to mid-off
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Karthik, no run

items.text: length ball slanted into the corridor. Defended off the inside half
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Karthik, no run

items.text: length on leg stump, flicked to deep square leg
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Karthik, 1 run

items.text: shot. Length ball wide outside off, a languid chop on the up to sweeper's left
items.postText: Sayeed Ayub: "14.6 Who was the fielder? " --- Soumya Sarkar
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Sharma, 1 run

items.text: bouncer dug in too short, lets it go
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Karthik, no run

items.text: oh shot. The fielder doesn't let it go though, a tumbling dive to the left at deep square. This was dropped short and Karthik pummeled this off the front foot with a horizontal bat
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Karthik, 2 runs

items.text: length on off stump, driven on the rise to mid-off
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Sharma, no run

items.text: slower ball on leg stump, flicked to midwicket off the front foot
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Sharma, no run

items.text: length on off stump, punched to mid-off on the up
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Sharma, no run
